Durham.Duke University School of Nursing: The Duke University School of Nursing is located in Durham, NC and is affiliated with Duke University and Duke University Health System. The school offers an accelerated Bachelor of Science in Nursing, a Master of Science in Nursing, Doctorate in Nursing Practice (DNP), and a Ph.D. Program. The 2018 US News & World Report ranked both the Masters and the Doctor of Nursing Practice degree programs as #1 overall.
